mapper.sql: MESSAGE_ID, MESSAGE_TYPE, MESSAGE_HOST, MESSAGE_FROM, SUBJECT, PRIORITY_LEVEL, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, MESSAGE_SOURCE
mapper.select: select msg.MESSAGE_ID, msg.MESSAGE_TYPE, msg.MESSAGE_HOST, msg.MESSAGE_FROM, msg.SUBJECT, msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL, msg.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, msg.REQUEST_ID, msg.PROGRAM_ID, msg.CREATED_BY, msg.CREATION_DATE, msg.LAST_UPDATED_BY, msg.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, msg.ATTRIBUTE1, msg.ATTRIBUTE2, msg.ATTRIBUTE3, msg.ATTRIBUTE4, msg.ATTRIBUTE5, msg.ATTRIBUTE6, msg.ATTRIBUTE7, msg.ATTRIBUTE8, msg.ATTRIBUTE9, msg.ATTRIBUTE10, msg.ATTRIBUTE11, msg.ATTRIBUTE12, msg.ATTRIBUTE13, msg.ATTRIBUTE14, msg.ATTRIBUTE15, msg.CONTENT, msg.MESSAGE_SOURCE from SYS_MESSAGE msg where msg.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'SMS' and (msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL is null or msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'NORMAL') and msg.SEND_FLAG not in ('Y','F')

select msg.MESSAGE_ID, msg.MESSAGE_TYPE, msg.MESSAGE_HOST, msg.MESSAGE_FROM, msg.SUBJECT, msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL, msg.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, msg.REQUEST_ID, msg.PROGRAM_ID, msg.CREATED_BY, msg.CREATION_DATE, msg.LAST_UPDATED_BY, msg.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, msg.ATTRIBUTE1, msg.ATTRIBUTE2, msg.ATTRIBUTE3, msg.ATTRIBUTE4, msg.ATTRIBUTE5, msg.ATTRIBUTE6, msg.ATTRIBUTE7, msg.ATTRIBUTE8, msg.ATTRIBUTE9, msg.ATTRIBUTE10, msg.ATTRIBUTE11, msg.ATTRIBUTE12, msg.ATTRIBUTE13, msg.ATTRIBUTE14, msg.ATTRIBUTE15, msg.CONTENT, msg.MESSAGE_SOURCE from SYS_MESSAGE msg where msg.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'SMS' and msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'VIP' and msg.SEND_FLAG not in ('Y','F')

select msg.MESSAGE_ID, msg.MESSAGE_TYPE, msg.MESSAGE_HOST, msg.MESSAGE_FROM, msg.SUBJECT, msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL, msg.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, msg.REQUEST_ID, msg.PROGRAM_ID, msg.CREATED_BY, msg.CREATION_DATE, msg.LAST_UPDATED_BY, msg.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, msg.ATTRIBUTE1, msg.ATTRIBUTE2, msg.ATTRIBUTE3, msg.ATTRIBUTE4, msg.ATTRIBUTE5, msg.ATTRIBUTE6, msg.ATTRIBUTE7, msg.ATTRIBUTE8, msg.ATTRIBUTE9, msg.ATTRIBUTE10, msg.ATTRIBUTE11, msg.ATTRIBUTE12, msg.ATTRIBUTE13, msg.ATTRIBUTE14, msg.ATTRIBUTE15, msg.CONTENT, msg.MESSAGE_SOURCE from SYS_MESSAGE msg where msg.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'EMAIL' and (msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL is null or msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'NORMAL') and msg.SEND_FLAG not in ('Y','F')

select msg.MESSAGE_ID, msg.MESSAGE_TYPE, msg.MESSAGE_HOST, msg.MESSAGE_FROM, msg.SUBJECT, msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL, msg.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, msg.REQUEST_ID, msg.PROGRAM_ID, msg.CREATED_BY, msg.CREATION_DATE, msg.LAST_UPDATED_BY, msg.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, msg.ATTRIBUTE1, msg.ATTRIBUTE2, msg.ATTRIBUTE3, msg.ATTRIBUTE4, msg.ATTRIBUTE5, msg.ATTRIBUTE6, msg.ATTRIBUTE7, msg.ATTRIBUTE8, msg.ATTRIBUTE9, msg.ATTRIBUTE10, msg.ATTRIBUTE11, msg.ATTRIBUTE12, msg.ATTRIBUTE13, msg.ATTRIBUTE14, msg.ATTRIBUTE15, msg.CONTENT, msg.MESSAGE_SOURCE from SYS_MESSAGE msg where msg.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'EMAIL' and msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'VIP' and msg.SEND_FLAG not in ('Y','F')

select msg.MESSAGE_ID, msg.MESSAGE_TYPE, msg.MESSAGE_HOST, msg.MESSAGE_FROM, msg.SUBJECT, msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL, msg.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, msg.REQUEST_ID, msg.PROGRAM_ID, msg.CREATED_BY, msg.CREATION_DATE, msg.LAST_UPDATED_BY, msg.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, msg.ATTRIBUTE1, msg.ATTRIBUTE2, msg.ATTRIBUTE3, msg.ATTRIBUTE4, msg.ATTRIBUTE5, msg.ATTRIBUTE6, msg.ATTRIBUTE7, msg.ATTRIBUTE8, msg.ATTRIBUTE9, msg.ATTRIBUTE10, msg.ATTRIBUTE11, msg.ATTRIBUTE12, msg.ATTRIBUTE13, msg.ATTRIBUTE14, msg.ATTRIBUTE15, msg.CONTENT, msg.MESSAGE_SOURCE from SYS_MESSAGE msg where msg.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'SITE' and (msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL is null or msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'NORMAL') and msg.SEND_FLAG not in ('Y','F')

select msg.MESSAGE_ID, msg.MESSAGE_TYPE, msg.MESSAGE_HOST, msg.MESSAGE_FROM, msg.SUBJECT, msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL, msg.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, msg.REQUEST_ID, msg.PROGRAM_ID, msg.CREATED_BY, msg.CREATION_DATE, msg.LAST_UPDATED_BY, msg.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, msg.ATTRIBUTE1, msg.ATTRIBUTE2, msg.ATTRIBUTE3, msg.ATTRIBUTE4, msg.ATTRIBUTE5, msg.ATTRIBUTE6, msg.ATTRIBUTE7, msg.ATTRIBUTE8, msg.ATTRIBUTE9, msg.ATTRIBUTE10, msg.ATTRIBUTE11, msg.ATTRIBUTE12, msg.ATTRIBUTE13, msg.ATTRIBUTE14, msg.ATTRIBUTE15, msg.CONTENT, msg.MESSAGE_SOURCE from SYS_MESSAGE msg where msg.MESSAGE_TYPE = 'SITE' and msg.PRIORITY_LEVEL = 'VIP' and msg.SEND_FLAG not in ('Y','F')
mapper.insert:
select SYS_MESSAGE_S.nextval from dual
insert into SYS_MESSAGE (MESSAGE_ID, MESSAGE_TYPE, MESSAGE_HOST, MESSAGE_FROM, SUBJECT, PRIORITY_LEVEL, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15, CONTENT, MESSAGE_SOURCE, SEND_FLAG ) values (#{messageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{messageFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objectVersionNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, #{messageSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

select SYS_MESSAGE_S.nextval from dual

MESSAGE_ID,

mapper.update:
update SYS_MESSAGE
MESSAGE_TYPE = #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE_HOST = #{messageHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE_FROM = #{messageFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRIORITY_LEVEL = #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = #{objectVersionNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB},
MESSAGE_SOURCE = #{messageSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_FLAG = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_MESSAGE set MESSAGE_TYPE = #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_HOST = #{messageHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_FROM = #{messageFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY_LEVEL = #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = #{objectVersionNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, MESSAGE_SOURCE = #{messageSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_FLAG = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_MESSAGE set MESSAGE_TYPE = #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_HOST = #{messageHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE_FROM = #{messageFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRIORITY_LEVEL = #{priorityLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = #{objectVersionNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, MESSAGE_SOURCE = #{messageSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_FLAG = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
,
from SYS_MESSAGE sm
sm.MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND sm.MESSAGE_TYPE like concat('%',concat(#{messageHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')) #{messageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND sm.MESSAGE_HOST like concat('%',concat(#{messageHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND sm.MESSAGE_FROM like concat('%',concat(#{messageFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND sm.SUBJECT like concat('%',concat(#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))

select distinct sm.MESSAGE_ID, sm.MESSAGE_TYPE, sm.MESSAGE_HOST, sm.MESSAGE_FROM, sm.SUBJECT, to_char(sm.CONTENT) as content, sm.SEND_FLAG as transaction_status from SYS_MESSAGE sm
sm.SUBJECT like concat('%',concat(#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
